results.name: a(n) = Sum_{k=1..n} gcd(k,n)^(n/gcd(k,n)).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
mathematica: a[n_] := Sum[GCD[k, n]^(n/GCD[k, n]), {k, 1, n}]; Array[a, 40] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Mar 11 2021 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = sum(k=1, n, gcd(k, n)^(n/gcd(k, n)));
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Mar 11 2021
